nodes.bodyText: Hi, there are some configurations for type inference, such as floating_string_infer_type, integer_string_infer_type, and boolean_string_infer_type. Do we need to add a nan_string_infer_type configuration?
Good Hint. Personally I would see Nan as a Double Literal and thus probably use the check on floating_string_infer_type. WDYT?
I prefer to add a configuration nan_string_infer_type=DOUBLE  by default and enable users to change this to TEXT.
Yes, that makes sense to me. I will add that option (if I find out how this works...:D).

You could add nan_string_infer_type=DOUBLE in server/src/assembly/resources/conf/iotdb-engine.properties， Then add itmes in IoTDBDescriptor and IoTDBConfig class.
After adding this, the docs should be updated in docs/UserGuide/Server/Config Manual.md.
I will add some system design doc for how to do these things.
Thanks for the advice, I have done it. And also added notes for the other inference config properties as they were missing so far.
